thread.title: Cozy boutique hotel on a quiet street
thread.title_full: Cozy boutique hotel on a quiet street - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ireninha1
title: Cozy boutique hotel on a quiet street
text: This cozy hotel was nicely decorated and was situated in the lovely bohemic Marrais neighborhood. The rooms were tiny but it was forgiven due to the perfect location. Great shopping right next to the hotel not to mention excellent restaurants. Within a walking distance from Notre Dam. I will return to this one!
